tooltip.bob_boots.1: Attacking the target's buttocks can deal 20 points of damage.
tooltip.bob_boots.2: Use ass reveal goggles to see the target's ass.
tooltip.ctrl_c.1: §cRight click to stop the command prompt.
tooltip.dirt_ball_item.1: Right click to throw ZZZZ ball, in the possession of ZZZZ flower damage doubled.
tooltip.dirt_ball_item.3: Use while sneaking to enable automatic random throwing.
tooltip.dusty_sword.1: Increases damage by 6 points and shoots ZZZZ ball while having ZZZZ flower.
tooltip.flower_item.1: Right click to open ZZZZ flower.
tooltip.flower_item.2: shift+right click to adjust the rotation speed.
tooltip.human_glass.1: Wash away the curse of immortality from your body.
tooltip.i_am_furry: Use it to put a fox tail and fox ears on your body.
tooltip.mango_box.1: Use items that can be deposited in the off hand at the time of the main hand.
tooltip.super_food: Use this item to convert secondary items into food.
tooltip.super_food.2: §4§lYou should not do this!You should not do this!
tooltip.swallow_the_world.1: Long-pressing the right button will continue to damage nearby entities and replenish fullness.
